title: start
content:
Start a New Application

In the Start section, you can begin a new application by pressing the 'Start Application' button. This option is for applicants who are submitting an application for the first time or want to start a new one.

1. Starting a New Application:

Clicking the 'Start Application' button will take you to the first step of the application process. You will be guided through various forms and fields where you’ll need to enter required information.

2. Resume an Existing Application:

If you have already started an application but haven’t completed it, there’s no need to start from scratch. You can resume your progress by going to the View Application section.

  • Viewing Started Applications: In the View Application section, you’ll see a button labeled 'View Started Applications.' Clicking this button will open a screen that displays all the applications you’ve already started but haven’t completed. This allows you to continue working from where you left off.

3. Next Steps:

Once you’ve resumed your application, you can pick up right from the step where you left off. If you encounter any issues, feel free to reach out to support for further assistance.
